duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to drive revenue and acquire new business accounts.
Lead business-to-business sales initiatives, setting targets and guiding the sales team to achieve set goals.
Analyze market trends, client behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Build and maintain a strong online and offline network, actively engaging and creating touchpoints with potential clients.
Plan and execute face-to-face meetings and networking events to showcase services and establish critical business relationships.
Measure and report on the performance of sales activities, using data-driven insights to continuously improve sales strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
